name: @ffk/api
description: Fleet of the Faithful Knights API

scripts.docker-run: docker run -i --net='host' -e FFK_DATABASE_SERVER=$FFK_DATABASE_SERVER -e FFK_DATABASE_PORT=$FFK_DATABASE_PORT -e FFK_DATABASE_NAME=$FFK_DATABASE_NAME -e FFK_DATABASE_USERNAME=$FFK_DATABASE_USERNAME -e FFK_DATABASE_PASSWORD=$FFK_DATABASE_PASSWORD ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/api.faithfulknights.com:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)
scripts.docker-publish: docker push ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/api.faithfulknights.com:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD) && docker push ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/api.faithfulknights.com:latest

author: Keanu Ashwell
